com.github.jonathanxd.iutils.object

Class Either<L,R>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.jonathanxd.iutils.object.BaseEither
      • com.github.jonathanxd.iutils.object.Either<L,R>
  • Type Parameters:
    L - Left value.
    R - Right value.

    public abstract class Either<L,R>
extends BaseEither
    A class which can hold either L or R (in this documentation we call the hold value as present value). Left value (L) and right value (R) may be null even if it is the present value.

    • Method Summary

      • mapLeft

        public abstract <ML> Either<ML,R> mapLeft(java.util.function.Function<? super L,? extends ML> leftMapper)
        Maps left value if present and return a new Either with mapped value. If left value is not present, a new identical Either will be returned.
        Type Parameters:
        ML - Left type.
        Parameters:
        leftMapper - Left value mapper.
        Returns:
        Either instance with mapped left value.
